alert.note: Alert for Harris; Lamar; Meriwether; Pike; Talbot; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 6:16AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Meriwether, southern Pike, Upson, northern Talbot, northeastern Harris and central Lamar Counties through 645 AM EDT... At 615 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Raleigh, or 10 miles southeast of Greenville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Thomaston, Barnesville, Zebulon, Greenville, Manchester, Woodbury, Milner, Warm Springs, Woodland, Molena, Yatesville, Meansville, Aldora, Sunset Village, Lincoln Park, The Rock, Shiloh, Concord, Atwater and Flint Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Harris; Lamar; Meriwether; Pike; Talbot; Upson
